availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John F. Buning (Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, plasterer)

body.p: Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, plasterer. Hanover, Germany native. Married to Dora Buning. Father of Mary Buning and John Buning. Plasterer in Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky 1850. Plasterer in Campbell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 28A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 426.
